name: Monster Frontier Rally!
description:
Monster Frontier Rally!

Developed under 7 days during Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 (Theme: Stronger Together)

Developed By
@kxuan98 - Game Designer, Core Programmer
@Hexcolyte - Lead Programmer
@DigitalEcho - UI Designer, Programmer
@mlwong54 - Art and Animation Director

Story

As the darkness engulfed the land, the monsters that were living underground has become active again in the human world. Just when people starting to lose hope, heroes from across the world showed up in the wild and defeat the monsters together. Find and recruit heroes along your journey to help u fight the horde!

How-to-play a. Control

Movement: WASD
Fire: Left Click

Each time you start a new game, you will be given a random character from 4 distinct classes (Archer, Alchemist, Heavy Gunner, Rogue). As you progress through the game, you will find heroes that will join your party to help defeat the monsters.  They are marked by an arrow for you to find them, but you can only recruit one at a time! 

b. Classes
  • Archer - Fast Shooting Class with Moderate Speed and Damage
  • Alchemist - High Damage and Regen class with Slow Attack and Movement Speed
  • Heavy Gunner - High Health, Damage and Projectile Speed Class with very Slow Movement Speed
  • Rogue - Very High Movement Speed with Low health with Moderate Damage
c. Party Resonance

By recruiting different classes of heroes into your team, they will have resonance, buffing your stats based on the heroes you recruited!

  • Archer - Attack Speed Buff
  • Alchemist - Damage and Regen Buff
  • Heavy Gunner - Health and Projectile Speed Buff
  • Rogue - Movement Speed Buff

BUT BE CAREFUL!!! If your party have only one type of classes, you would not benefit from the Party Resonance!

d. Team Positioning
  • Each of the heroes has a different movement speed, using the obstacles in the game world, repositioning your team formation with stick together. Don't run too far away with Rogue!
  • When an enemy hits you, they will push your party members away, disrupting your team formation and tear you apart! Use the obstacles to recover back your team formation!
